body_html:
Thank you.Michaelisard.
I am trying to restore the saved models trained yesterday,The saved models are listed as above but can't be restored because of the NotFoundError. There is no warning or error when I saved models.
I want to load each model and evaluate, not just the latest one.

The codes of restoring models are in validate.py below.The zip also includes my model.If there is anything that lead to the restore failure in model, please let me know.The doc about restore is quite brief.
Thanks!
validate_models.zip

body:
Thank you.Michaelisard.
I am trying to restore  the saved models trained yesterday,The saved models are listed as above but  can't be restored because of the NotFoundError. There is no warning or error when I saved models.
I want to load each model and evaluate, not just the latest one.


The codes of restoring models are in validate.py below.The zip also includes my model.If there is anything that lead to the restore failure in model, please let me know.The doc about restore is quite brief.
Thanks!
[validate_models.zip](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/633192/validate_models.zip)
